events.message: I just received my order and unfortunately the new blender I bought has a crack on the glass jar. It looks broken right out of the box and I am really disappointed.
The system classified this reported problem as a product defect due to the customer stating the item is broken and damaged on arrival.
An agent has been assigned to handle the customer's claim regarding the damaged product in their recent order.
Hello, this is Alex from customer support. I’m sorry to hear about the cracked blender jar you received. Let’s get this fixed for you as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide a photo of the damaged jar and your order number so I can verify the issue and start the replacement process?
Thank you for responding. I’ve attached the photos of the cracked blender jar and my order number is 123456789. Please let me know what happens next.
We can send you a replacement blender jar at no extra cost or offer a full refund if you prefer. Please let us know which option works best for you.
I would appreciate receiving a replacement please. A refund isn’t necessary since I still want to use the blender. Thanks for your help so far.
Your replacement blender jar has been dispatched today and you should receive it within 3-5 business days. We apologize again for the inconvenience caused.
Just checking in to see if your replacement blender jar has arrived and if everything is working fine now. Please let us know if any further assistance is needed.
After confirming the customer’s satisfaction with the replacement, we have formally closed the case. Thank you for your patience and cooperation.
We have sent a customer satisfaction survey via email to gather your feedback on how this issue was handled.
